text: Ctenopelta is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Peltospiridae. ==Species== Species within the genus Ctenopelta include: * Ctenopelta porifera Warén & Bouchet, 1993 ==References== * Warén A. & Bouchet P. (1993) New records, species, genera, and a new family of gastropods from hydrothermal vents and hydrocarbon seeps. Zoologica Scripta 22: 1-90. Category:Peltospiridae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Ctenopelta
